databaseUnavailable.title: Unable to Connect to Database
databaseUnavailable.body: Unable to establish a database connection. Please try again later.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.body: Your role does not allow you to perform this operation. Contact your Security Administrator to change your access rights.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.body: Your role does not allow you to access these attributes. Contact your Security Administrator to change your access rights.

forbiddenTBAC.title: Access Denied
forbiddenTBAC.body: Your Target Based Access Control rights do not allow you to access this Managed Object. Contact your System Administrator to change your access rights.

persistentObjectError.title: Unable to Retrieve Data
persistentObjectError.body: The server encountered an internal error. Please try again later.

persistentObjectNotFound.title: Could not find requested object
persistentObjectNotFound.body: We cannot find the requested object. It may have been removed or is not available at this time. Please try again later.

networkObjectNotFound.title: Could not find requested object
networkObjectNotFound.body: We cannot find the requested object. It may have been removed or is not available at this time.

nodeBusy.title: Node Busy
nodeBusy.body: Failed to retrieve Non-Persistent Attributes. Try again later.

poidNotAvailable.title: Missing network object
poidNotAvailable.body: This network object is removed or not available.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.body: The service is currently unavailable. Please retry your request later. If the problem persists, contact your System Administrator.

timeoutSave.title: Action in progress
timeoutSave.body: Save ongoing, please check later if it was successful.

unknownServerError.title: Unknown server error
unknownServerError.body: There was an unknown server error

initiateCmSyncSupervisionDisabled.rawContentMarker: Please ensure that the active attribute in the CmNodeHeartbeatSupervision MO has been set to true
initiateCmSyncSupervisionDisabled.title: Node supervision disabled
initiateCmSyncSupervisionDisabled.body: Sync initiation failed, please check if supervision is active for the node.

initiateCmSyncMediationServiceUnavailabl.rawContentMarker: No suitable Mediation Service registered for flow
initiateCmSyncMediationServiceUnavailabl.title: Service Unavailable
initiateCmSyncMediationServiceUnavailabl.body: The service is currently unavailable. Please retry your request later. If the problem persists, contact your System Administrator.

memoryProtectionDataRetrievalError.title: Unable to Retrieve Data
memoryProtectionDataRetrievalError.body: There is currently no capacity to process the request due to a large amount of activity on the server. Please try again later.

memoryProtectionLocateObjectError.title: Unable to Locate Object
memoryProtectionLocateObjectError.body: There is currently no capacity to process the request due to a large amount of activity on the server. Please try again later.

InitiateCmSync.confirmContent: Are you sure you want to proceed?

emptyCollectionError.title: Empty Collection
emptyCollectionError.body: The selected collection does not contain any nodes. Please select a different collection and try again.
